recommendations.title: Increase Font Sizes Below 16px
recommendations.description: Found 8 font sizes below the mobile minimum of 16px. These should be increased to ensure readability on mobile devices.
recommendations.action: Update all font sizes below 16px to meet mobile minimum standards

recommendations.title: Replace Fixed Font Sizes
recommendations.description: Found 30 fixed font sizes that don't scale responsively. Consider using relative units (rem, em) or CSS custom properties.
recommendations.action: Convert fixed pixel values to relative units or CSS variables

recommendations.title: Fix Extremely Small Font Sizes
recommendations.description: Found 1 font sizes below 12px. These are too small for any device and should be increased immediately.
recommendations.action: Increase all font sizes below 12px to at least 14px

recommendations.title: Improve Responsive Font Scaling
recommendations.description: Only 0 responsive font sizes found vs 30 fixed sizes. Consider implementing a responsive typography system.
recommendations.action: Implement CSS custom properties and media queries for responsive font scaling
